Shader::Begin

Shader::Begin Class Reference

#include <Shader.h>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Begins rendering using the shader.

Calls NS(Shader,begin)() in the constructor and NS(Shader,end)() in the destructor. Use this class instead of the methods directly for exception-safety.

See also:
NS(Shader,begin)


Public Member Functions

 Begin (Shader *shader)
 Begins rendering using the shader.
int passes () const
 Returns number of passes needed by the shader.
 ~Begin ()
 Ends rendering using the shader.
